snippet: The Park Avenue Armory’s 2015 season will include the latest installment of Laurie Anderson’s “Language of the Future” series and a collaboration between Marina Abramovic and the pianist Igor Levit.
abstract: The Park Avenue Armory’s 2015 season will include the latest installment of Laurie Anderson’s “Language of the Future” series and a collaboration between Marina Abramovic and the pianist Igor Levit.

headline.main: Armory to Offer Works by Laurie Anderson and Marina Abramovic
headline.print_headline: Anderson at Armory, And Abramovic, Too
